page.title: 12Church of North Knapdale
page.content: THE PARISH OF NORTH KNAPDALE INCLUDES THE CHURCHES AT TAYVALLICH,BELLANOCH ACHNAMARA.THE REV.MONTGOMERY HAS BEEN MINISTER FOR 14 YEARS.HE LIVES IN THE MANSE AT TAYVALLICH.INVERLUSSA CHURCH, ABOUT 2 MILES SOUTH OF ACHNAMARA, IS 165 YEARS OLD.THE CHURCH WAS DECLARED UNFIT FOR USE IN SPRING 1984.THE ROOF IS IN NEED OF ATTENTION.THE SLATES ARE POROUS AND THE CEILING IS LEAKING.REPAIRS WILL COST APPROX Â£8 _10,OOO. MEANTIME FORTNIGHTLY CHURCH SERVICES ARE HELD IN THE VILLAGE HALL.AVERAGE ATTENDANCE _ 20. SPECIAL DAYS 35 _4O. ANNUAL AVERAGE INCOME OF PARISH Â£7,500. PRESENT ROLL 75. WEEKLY SUNDAY SCHOOL AND BIBLE CLASS HELD IN VILLAGERS HOUSE. THERE IS A PARTY IN JANUARY,OUTING TO KNAP BEACH AND PRIZE GIVING IN JUNE.THE MINISTER VISITS THE PRIMARY SCHOOL EVERY WEDNESDAY.
